# SubAgent: backend-architect

Execute this SubAgent with the given task.

Start command:
```bash
"$SUBAGENTS_DIR/start.sh" claude backend-architect "$TASK"
```

Resume command (if questions are asked):
```bash
"$SUBAGENTS_DIR/resume.sh" claude backend-architect $SESSION_ID "$ANSWER"
```
